name: Avast Compressed Skin
summary: Learn about .ASWCS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can package ASWS files as ASWCS files with the SkinPacker program (ashSkPck.exe) included with Avast installations. However, Avast dropped support for ASWS skin files and ASWCS compressed skin files beginning with Avast 5 and later. Therefore, ASWCS and ASWS files are no longer usable with recent editions of the software.

description: An ASWCS file is a compressed skin used by Avast antivirus software. It contains an .ASWS skin file compressed for quicker upload and download times.
